text.0: the drop of soma juice effused flows onward with this stream impelled.
text.1: rending strong places with its might.
text.2: poured forth to indra varuṇa to vāyu and the marut hosts.
text.3: to viṣṇu flows the soma juice.
text.4: with stones they press the soma forth the strong conducted by the strong.
text.5: they milk the liquor out with skill.
text.6: tis he whom trita must refine tis he who shall make indra glad.
text.7: the tawny one is decked with tints.
text.8: him do the sons of pṛśni milk the dwellingplace of sacrifice.
text.10: to him in one unitcd stream thse songs flow on straight forward he.
text.11: loud voiced hath made the milchkine low.
